bug.author: miguelgfierro
bug.summary: [BUG] check smoke and integration tests for SAR and fastai
bug.description:

SAR and fastai nightly builds are failing <denchmark-link:https://msdata.visualstudio.com/AlgorithmsAndDataScience/_build/results?buildId=2200124>https://msdata.visualstudio.com/AlgorithmsAndDataScience/_build/results?buildId=2200124</denchmark-link>

Azure Data Science Virtual Machine.
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
For example:
The tests should pass successfully.
